verses.name: Haggai 2:4
verses.text: Yet now be strong, O Zerubbabel, saith the Lord; and be strong, O Joshua, son of Josedech, the high priest; and be strong, all ye people of the land, saith the Lord, and work: for I am with you, saith the Lord of hosts:

verses.name: Haggai 2:5
verses.text: According to the word that I covenanted with you when ye came out of Egypt, so my spirit remaineth among you: fear ye not.

verses.name: Haggai 2:6
verses.text: For thus saith the Lord of hosts; Yet once, it is a little while, and I will shake the heavens, and the earth, and the sea, and the dry land;
